analysis.Summary: Vue component rendering a hero section with localized title, description, contact information and an autoplaying background video.
analysis.Purpose: Acts as the main hero block on the landing page, providing an engaging video backdrop plus dynamically translated text and contact details.

Components.name: SectionHeroVideo
Components.role: Container component for the hero section combining text and video

Components.name: videoElement (ref)
Components.role: Reference to the HTML5 video element for programmatic control

Functions.name: checkAndPlayVideo
Functions.description: Registers event handlers on the video element to track play/pause state.

Functions.name: playVid
Functions.description: Attempts to play the video if it is paused and not already playing.

Functions.name: onMounted callback
Functions.description: Lifecycle hook that initializes video event listeners and triggers playback on mount.

analysis.Usage: Imported into the landing page or parent layout and rendered as `<SectionHeroVideo/>`. It relies on the project's i18n setup to supply the translation function.
Notes: Component uses inline i18n messages; English and Russian locales are defined but Russian lacks some contact keys.
The `<video>` tag has a typo: `playsinlineclass` should probably be `playsinline`.
SCSS includes a mobile breakpoint that reorders columns and applies a gradient overlay on the video.
Video is set to `autoplay muted loop playsinline` for mobile compatibility.
